name: ComboHigh
description:
In this top down shooter game your combo meter is your health. There are constantly spawning enemies, different weapons and explosive barrels.

PRESS P TO ACTIVATE/REMOVE SCREEN SHAKE
PRESS R TO RESTART

Controls:
-wasd or arrows to move
-left click to attack/shoot
-right click to dash
-mouse wheel up to select your guns
-mouse wheel down to select your swords
-shift to slow down time


-You get dashes back by killing enemies
-You get combo by killing enemies, and lose by getting hit or not killing for too long
-If you get to 9 combo (the max) you get a speed boost and an attack speed boost
